_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate navigation and layout text
_meta.note: Navigation labels should be short (1-2 words) and clear about destination.

navigation.pricing: Link to pricing page. Ex: 'Pricing', 'Plans', 'Plans & Pricing'
navigation.about: Link to about page. Ex: 'About', 'About Us', 'Our Story'
navigation.myAccount: Link to account settings. Ex: 'My Account', 'Account', 'Profile'
navigation.logout: Link/button to log out. Ex: 'Logout', 'Sign Out', 'Log Out'
navigation.login: Link to login page. Ex: 'Log In', 'Sign In', 'Login'
navigation.register: Link to registration. Ex: 'Sign Up', 'Register', 'Get Started'

footer.product: Footer section heading for product links. Ex: 'Product', 'Features'
footer.company: Footer section heading for company links. Ex: 'Company', 'About'
footer.legal: Footer section heading for legal links. Ex: 'Legal', 'Terms & Privacy'
footer.support: Footer section heading for support links. Ex: 'Support', 'Help'
footer.social: Footer section heading for social links. Ex: 'Social', 'Follow Us', 'Connect'
footer.copyright: Copyright text. Include {year} and {companyName} placeholders. Ex: 'Â© {year} {companyName}. All rights reserved.'

mobile.menu: Mobile menu button label. Ex: 'Menu', 'Navigation', 'Open menu'
mobile.closeMenu: Close mobile menu button. Ex: 'Close menu', 'Close', 'Hide menu'
